WebCartAdjustmentBasis.name: WebCartAdjustmentBasis
WebCartAdjustmentBasis.description: Coupons that trigger promotions for the cart. When a customer tries to add a coupon to the cart, the store looks for promotions associated with the coupon. If a promotion results in a price adjustment, a WebCartAdjusmentBasis record is created.

AdjustmentBasisDetail.description: Coupon code for the coupon associated with the promotion.

AdjustmentBasisReferenceId.description: Foreign key reference to the coupon.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the cart.
